metadata.title: CVE-2024-24788 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A malformed DNS message in response to a query can cause the Lookupfunctions to get stuck in an infinite loop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.22 - 1.22.2-2ubuntu0.1
golang-1.22-go - 1.22.2-2ubuntu0.1
golang-1.22-src - 1.22.2-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.22 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.22.2-2ubuntu0.1').
